title: User Authentication System
description: As a user, I want to securely login and logout so that my account and data are protected
acceptanceCriteria: User can register with email/password, login with valid credentials, logout securely, and recover forgotten passwords

title: Product Search and Filtering
description: As a customer, I want to search and filter products so that I can quickly find what I'm looking for
acceptanceCriteria: Search works by product name and description, filters available for price, category, and ratings, results update in real-time

title: Shopping Cart Management
description: As a customer, I want to add products to my cart and manage quantities so that I can purchase multiple items
acceptanceCriteria: Add/remove items from cart, update quantities, view cart total, persist cart between sessions

title: Mobile App Navigation
description: As a mobile user, I want intuitive navigation so that I can easily access all app features
acceptanceCriteria: Bottom tab navigation, side menu for secondary features, back button functionality, deep linking support

title: Push Notifications
description: As a user, I want to receive relevant notifications so that I stay informed about important updates
acceptanceCriteria: Order status notifications, promotional offers, system announcements, notification preferences

title: Offline Functionality
description: As a mobile user, I want to access key features offline so that I can use the app without internet connectivity
acceptanceCriteria: View cached content offline, sync data when online, offline indicators, queue actions for sync

title: API Gateway Setup
description: As a developer, I want a centralized API gateway so that all microservices have consistent routing and security
acceptanceCriteria: Single entry point for all APIs, authentication at gateway level, rate limiting, request logging

title: Service Containerization
description: As a DevOps engineer, I want all services containerized so that deployment is consistent and scalable
acceptanceCriteria: Docker containers for each service, consistent base images, environment configuration, health checks

title: Service Discovery
description: As a system architect, I want automatic service discovery so that services can find and communicate with each other
acceptanceCriteria: Services register automatically, health monitoring, load balancing, failover handling

title: Dashboard Customization
description: As a business user, I want to customize my dashboard so that I can see the most relevant metrics for my role
acceptanceCriteria: Drag-and-drop widgets, save custom layouts, role-based default dashboards, export functionality

title: Real-time Data Updates
description: As a business analyst, I want real-time data updates so that I always see the most current information
acceptanceCriteria: Live data refresh, real-time charts, change indicators, automatic updates every 30 seconds

title: Automated Reporting
description: As a manager, I want automated reports so that I receive regular updates without manual effort
acceptanceCriteria: Schedule reports daily/weekly/monthly, email delivery, PDF format, custom report templates

title: Ticket Management System
description: As a customer, I want to create and track support tickets so that I can get help with issues
acceptanceCriteria: Create tickets with attachments, track status, receive email updates, rate support quality

title: Knowledge Base Search
description: As a customer, I want to search the knowledge base so that I can find answers to common questions
acceptanceCriteria: Full-text search, categorized articles, related articles suggestions, feedback on helpfulness

title: Barcode Scanning
description: As a warehouse worker, I want to scan barcodes so that I can quickly update inventory counts
acceptanceCriteria: Mobile barcode scanning, batch operations, offline capability, error handling for invalid codes
